text: Marion Rose Scrymgour (born 13 September 1960) is an Australian politician. She is currently serving as the member for the seat of Lingiari in the Northern Territory. She is a member of the Labor Party. Scrymgour used to be the member for the seat of Arafura in the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly. She was the first Indigenous woman to be elected to the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly. Scrymgour is Aboriginal, belonging to the Tiwi mob from the Tiwi Islands. ==Notes== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Indigenous Australian people Category:Politicians from Darwin, Northern Territory
title: Marion Scrymgour
